August 1943.The circulation of this paper has been strictly limited, it is issued for the personal use of .^^e^^^^-y^ (^^J^a/r .1 fiJL VfMOST SECRET.W.P. (43) 355.1st August, 1943.Copy No. o war CABINET.EFFICIENCY OF GERMAN AND ITALIAN U-BOATS OPERATINGOUTSIDE THE MEDITERRANEAN.Note by the Prime Minister and Minister of Defence.- MY colleagues may be interested in the following pregnant figures whichwere produced by the Paymaster-General's branch and are concurred in by theAdmiralty. The results are most encouraging and reflect high credit onthe Admiralty and the Air Ministry and all branches concerned.W. S. C.10 Downing Street, S. W. 1,1st Auaust, 1943.Period.1st half 19422nd half 19421st half 1943[25864]Table.Number of Ships sunk onthe average per month by each U-boat at sea.1-6-8
